ModMetaData.name: [LTS]Furnishing - Arches/Doorways Patch (Continued)
ModMetaData.author: DownByLaw, updated by rasmus
ModMetaData.description:
Bumped the version number to the latest version of RimWorld. Also fixed an issue where the mod was injecting a duplicate XML node for the Large Stone Arch.
Original description: [LTS]Furnishing - Arches/Doorways Patch
- Arches now have a texture variation that fits better into hallways - Doorways have a stretched texture variation to better fit walls
Variations can be built by using the rotation function
